column1: 15950,Irredeemable Ant-Man (2006) #10,10,33517,75,"Ant-Man is still on the run, but things have changed - Hulk has come to town. Will Ant-Man finally be the hero he was born to be and defend the city from the Green Goliath? Or will he use this opportunity to loot and pillage a devastated New York? ",
